en.cartDescription: Welcome to your cart. Review your selections, make any last-minute adjustments, and prepare for a seamless checkout experience tailored just for you.
en.salesTaxNote: † estimated sales tax. Additional tax may apply upon actual calculation of order
en.shippingNote: * estimated shipping charges. Additional charges may apply upon actual calculation of order
en.shareCartMessage: Share the current cart with you colleague or friend, simply scan the QR code or share the link
en.shareTipMessage: You can share the cart with your colleague or friend by simply scanning the QR code or sharing the link
en.notes: Have a note for our shipping team?
en.emptyCartDescription: Explore our top products or a wide range of options for your workflow solutions
en.wantMoreProductsDescription: Explore our top products or a wide range of options for your workflow solutions
en.noProductsFound: We're sorry. We could not find a match for
en.noResultSuggestions: Check for typos, spelling errors or try a different keyword
en.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
en.taxExemptFileFormats:
Please upload the tax exempt certificate for our team to validate
Formats: .JPG, .PNG, .PDF, .DOC and .DOCX
en.fileUploadError: Please upload expected file format and size.
en.taxExemptMessage: Please upload a clearly scanned copy of the tax exempt certificate for a quick review process.
en.shippingAddressDescription: Where should we ship your products to? Add a new address or pick from your saved addresses to streamline your checkout process.
en.billToAddressDescription: Where should we bill to for this order? Add a new address or pick from your saved addresses to streamline your checkout process.
en.selectAddress: Select an address below or add a new one.
en.addressFix: Lets see how we can fix that
en.confirmShippingMethodDescription: Your choice, your speed. Select your preferred shipping method. Have a special note thats okay add that to the notes field and we will do our best to facilitate.
en.choosePaymentMethodDescription: Select your preferred payment method. We accept all major credit cards and purchase orders.
en.paymentProcessingMessage: Your payment is being processed. Please do not refresh the page.
en.poDescription: If you have a purchase order that you would like to attach click the 'Upload' button and select the file before proceeding with checkout.
en.poFormats:
Please upload your purchase order
Formats: .JPG, .PNG, .PDF, .DOC and .DOCX
en.paymentErrorMessage: Please select another or add a new payment method.
en.orderConfirmedDescription: Congratulations! Your order is submitted. Get ready for the excitement as we process your purchase. Thank you for choosing us - your satisfaction is our top priority!
en.stayUptoDateDescription: Stay informed about your recent orders by tracking your orders online or checking your email for real-time updates.
en.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please try login again.
en.logoutSuccess: You have been successfully logged out.
en.termsContent: By clicking the {buttonName} button, you confirm that you have reviewed and agree with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
en.notLocalCustomer: Not a US Customer? Please contact our local office.
en.userAlreadyExistsMessage: User already exists, please login to continue or reset your password.
en.registerSuccessMessage: Thanks for registering, you will receive an email with instruction to set your password shortly. Please follow the instruction to set your password and login to your account.
en.forgotYourPasswordDescription: Don't worry it happens. Please enter the information associated with your account so we can reset your password.
en.setYourPasswordDescription: Enter a new password to keep your account safe.
en.forgotPasswordEmailSent: Password reset email sent. Please check your email and follow the instructions to reset your password.
en.noPaymentMethodMatched: Hmm, it looks like there are no payment method that match
en.emailSentToAddress: Please verify your email address by clicking the reset my password button in the email sent to { emailAddress }
en.refLengthError: Reference number should not exceed 20 characters
en.marketingFormOptInMessage: I am interested in receiving information about products, services, events (workshops, webinars), and educational content from Leica Microsystems GmbH, their representatives, and other Danaher companies. I consent to be contacted by phone or email.
en.usTariffDisclaimer: ‡ Tariff adjustment charges are calculated from components originating from different countries with varying tariff rates. These charges will affect the overall cost of the product and may fluctuate accordingly. The listed price is valid for products delivered during the period in which current tariff rates apply. Final invoice may be adjusted if tariff rates change. Tariffs are subject to taxation pursuant to applicable federal, state, and local laws, and the customer's tax status
